snippet.title: Swords 'n Magic and Stuff Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/810040/Swords_n_Magic_and_Stuff/
Watch live development at: https://www.twitch.tv/kindreddev

This is the official launch trailer for Swords 'n Magic and Stuff, a casual, cooperative open world RPG focused on the joy of discovery.

Get ready to grab your friends and set out into an incredible open-world filled with treasures, creatures, swords and spells in this adorable action-RPG that has something for players of all ages

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Join the community Discord to stay up to date on all the latest improvements or talk with the devs to ask all your burning questions

Media Kit:     https://bit.ly/SNMAS
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/810040/Swords_n_Magic_and_Stuff/
Homepage:   https://www.playswordsandmagic.com/
Discord:       https://discord.com/invite/buezuVS
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
